content: quick & easy pattern to crochet a bat finished size using dk/light worsted yarn is approx 16 cm wide by 11 cm tall you can use any weight yarn it will just produce a different size bat i would suggest using a slightly smaller hook size than standard for your yarn weight can be used as a hanging decoration in bunting or added as an applique embellishment to any halloween craft project more free halloween crochet patterns are also available on my craft fix blog 1 1 https //www craftfix com/tag/halloween
